message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a competitive price of $14,000. I believe this product would be highly valuable to you.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. How about $13,000?  I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your desired price point, the value this product offers is truly reflected in my initial price.  I could meet you halfway at $13,500.  This is my final offer.
